original_title: Vamos a cocinar fuego y a detener pescados
overview: The opening chords of the Organ Grinder theme open the scene to the waters running down a rushing river while, in its center, a young woman throws the line into the water, tenses it slightly and waits. As if looking for a new order, the organ grinder "with his bare feet on the snow" accompanies this murmur of waters, of opening skies, of fish stopped in the simplicity of dreams.
title: Let's Stop Fire and Cook Fish
